p: Four additional models were constructed using the wellness scale (WS) variable in place of the detailed clinical signs and symptoms: wellness parsimonious (including CT, patient age, body temperature, WS, TTP and CT x TTP), wellness parsimonious without temperature, wellness clinical-only (including patient age, body temperature, and WS), and wellness minimal (including CT, patient age, and WS). The performance indices of these models, obtained from internal validation on the Sierra Leonean patients from the IMC dataset, are shown in Table 5.
